an2.180-229:180.1.3: Anger and hostility … offensiveness and contempt … jealousy and stinginess … deceit and deviousness … lack of conscience and prudence.
an2.180-229:181.1.3: Freedom from anger and hostility … freedom from offensiveness and contempt … freedom from jealousy and stinginess … freedom from deceit and deviousness … conscience and prudence.
an2.180-229:186.1.1: “Anyone who has two things lives in suffering.
an2.180-229:186.1.3: Anger and hostility … offensiveness and contempt … jealousy and stinginess … deceit and deviousness … lack of conscience and prudence.
an2.180-229:186.1.4: Anyone who has these two things lives in suffering.”
an2.180-229:191.1.1: “Anyone who has these two things lives happily.
an2.180-229:191.1.3: Freedom from anger and hostility … freedom from offensiveness and contempt … freedom from jealousy and stinginess … freedom from deceit and deviousness … conscience and prudence.
an2.180-229:191.1.4: Anyone who has these two things lives happily.”
an2.180-229:196.1.1: “These two things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an2.180-229:196.1.3: Anger and hostility … offensiveness and contempt … jealousy and stinginess … deceit and deviousness … lack of conscience and prudence.
an2.180-229:196.1.4: These two things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
an2.180-229:201.1.1: “These two things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an2.180-229:201.1.3: Freedom from anger and hostility … freedom from offensiveness and contempt … freedom from jealousy and stinginess … freedom from deceit and deviousness … conscience and prudence.
an2.180-229:201.1.4: These two things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
an2.180-229:206.1.1: “Anyone who has two things is cast down to hell.
an2.180-229:206.1.3: Anger and hostility … offensiveness and contempt … jealousy and stinginess … deceit and deviousness … lack of conscience and prudence.
an2.180-229:206.1.4: Anyone who has these two things is cast down to hell.”
an2.180-229:211.1.1: “Anyone who has two things is raised up to heaven.
an2.180-229:211.1.3: Freedom from anger and hostility … freedom from offensiveness and contempt … freedom from jealousy and stinginess … freedom from deceit and deviousness … conscience and prudence.
an2.180-229:211.1.4: Anyone who has these two things is raised up to heaven.”
an2.180-229:216.1.1: “When they have two things, some people, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
an2.180-229:216.1.3: Anger and hostility … offensiveness and contempt … jealousy and stinginess … deceit and deviousness … lack of conscience and prudence.
an2.180-229:216.1.4: When they have two things, some people, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
an2.180-229:221.1.1: “When they have two things, some people—when their body breaks up, after death—are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
an2.180-229:221.1.3: Freedom from anger and hostility … freedom from offensiveness and contempt … freedom from jealousy and stinginess … freedom from deceit and deviousness … conscience and prudence.
an2.180-229:221.1.4: When they have these two things, some people—when their body breaks up, after death—are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
